title: SPAC Boom Reaches Peak as 613 SPACs Raise $160 Billion, Systematically Extracting Wealth from Retail Investors
description: The SPAC boom peaked in 2021 with 613 SPACs raising over $160 billion, representing more than half of all IPO volume. The structure systematically favored sponsors who received 20% stakes for minimal investment while retail investors faced massive losses, with 77% of post-merger SPACs trading below issue price within a year and over $46 billion in subsequent bankruptcies by 2023.
